## Source: amazon-inspector (030efb54b3c7ce3807868d73f64d415effba5c936da7b4fad9b37a7e184fbff7)
The package ember-addon-with-dependencies was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (947313a458e1b8a8adf79f51dde4ae9551ebc1756ba4269c016388a670f5c278)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ember-addon-with-dependencies' @ 2.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
